title: i will b purchasing my domain soon
content:
hello everyone
i am using a library internet terminal, i will return 2 st.l tuesday 28/3, anyway i have almost saved up enuff money to purchase my domain name ([url=http://www.rorie1983.com)]www.rorie1983.com)[/url] with [url=http://domains.quost.com/]quost domains[/url] the cost 4 a .com 4 2 years is AUD$35.99 which includes gst of AUD$3.27 which is pretty much the cheapest internet domain name service in australia that offers multiple options of payment that i have come across (pretty much every other service wants you 2 pay by credit card) but with quost you don't have 2) i just need to finish my site & upload it 2 the st.l server, purchase rorie1983.com & i'm done [url=http://www.ironmaiden.com][img]http://i11.photobucket.com/albums/a199/rorie1983/ironmaiden.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://simplythebest.net/fonts/fonts/font_downloads/iron_maiden.zip]Download the Iron Maiden font[/url]

title: Re: i will b purchasing my domain soon
content:

A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

title: Re: i will b purchasing my domain soon
content:
Ok, good luck! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] I'll check it out once it's in the web.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."
